text: "Isn't it a glorious thing! Long awaited transcendent event, the exalted desire of all mankind through all ages! The Kingdom of the Mind is at hand." He turned beaming eyes upward and shook his head slowly from side to side. "They have come," he said reverently, gripping his hands together between his knees and leaning forward.
